column2: "Ah, it's you. Um... if you have a moment, I'd like to ask you something."
"Has Ohza, maybe... mentioned me when you were talking to him?"
"We were partied while raiding the Mothership, but... we haven't seen each other since."
"I see... ah, um, it's nothing special, really..."
"It's not that I can't speak to him, there's just... this space, and it's really unnerving."
"...It's not my fault he keeps invading my space. Completely ignoring my feelings."
"That's why I can't stand Hunters. So... rude, and stifling."
"...but I suppose I can't blame him for keeping his distance when I'm saying things like that."
"...I hate Hunters. But it's not that I hate him in specific."
"I still have a lot to say to him, but... I fear it's too late. All because I'm too stubborn."
"Forgive me for making you listen to this nonsense. I need to go now."
"...Geez. Looks like this side needs a push in the right direction, too."
"I wanted to encourage them, but I never expected things to stalemate so badly."
"Well, since I'm partly to blame for this situation, it's time I lend a hand, don'cha think?"
"I'll need your help when that time comes! See ya!"
